Package org.elasticsearch.action.search

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MultiSearchAction  
    MultiSearchRequest
    A multi search API request.
    MultiSearchRequestBuilder
    A request builder for multiple search requests.
    MultiSearchResponse
    A multi search response.
    MultiSearchResponse.Item
    A search response item, holding the actual search response, or an error message if it failed.
    SearchAction  
    SearchRequest
    A request to execute search against one or more indices (or all).
    SearchRequestBuilder
    A search action request builder.
    SearchResponse
    A response of a search request.
    SearchScrollAction  
    SearchScrollRequest  
    SearchScrollRequestBuilder
    A search scroll action request builder.
    ShardSearchFailure
    Represents a failure to search on a specific shard.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SearchOperationThreading
    Controls the operation threading model for search operation that are performed locally on the executing node.
    SearchType
    Search type represent the manner at which the search operation is executed.
